mapper.select: SELECT cl.cno, cl.ino, cl.account, cl.status, cl.bno, TO_CHAR(cl.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS dbday, it.name AS item_name, it.poster AS item_poster, it.price AS item_price, it.type AS item_type, it.discount AS item_discount FROM Cartlist cl INNER JOIN item it ON cl.ino = it.ino WHERE cl.id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cl.status = 0 AND it.ino IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cl.cno DESC

select b.bno,b.id,b.regdate,total_price,c.cno,c.account,i.name,num FROM (select bno,id,regdate,total_price,rownum as num FROM (select bno,id,regdate,total_price FROM buy_history WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY bno desc)) b,CARTLIST c,ITEM i WHERE b.bno=c.bno AND c.ino=i.ino AND num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND c.status=1 ORDER BY bno DESC
